description.text: I'm a Software Engineer currently working in the Brazilian financial market, developing and maintaining credit card terminal apps, digital banking, sales portals, and other demanded software for the sector.

description.education-and-experience-intro: I'm graduating in Software Engineering at
description.education-and-experience-details: and currently working in a local growing company as a Software Engineer. In my daily work, I primarily use JavaScript, which I have extensive experience with; I also utilize frameworks like Vue, Nuxt, React, Next, and databases like PostgreSQL, MySQL, and MongoDB.

profile.details: a Software Engineer and Technology Enthusiast driven by a passion for new knowledge and experiences.
profile.photo-alt: My photo, in front of a white wall, wearing a black t-shirt

projects.title: My Projects
projects.description: Here is the list of projects that I am most satisfied with. Some of them I created to learn something new, while others I developed to generate income.

pontodigital.description: PontoDigital is an innovative platform for employee time tracking. It allows real-time monitoring of in-person, remote, and hybrid teams with detailed reports and customization. Offering API integration, data security, and dedicated support for businesses of all sizes.

rocketlaunches.description: RocketLaunches is the app for space enthusiasts! With it, you can know the upcoming rocket launches, explore information about missions, and see the latest news on space exploration. There are also options for developers who want to integrate this data into their projects.

gbreath.description: GBreath is an open-source project designed to assist meditation practitioners with breathing techniques. With it, users can enhance their breathing skills and promote well-being. Itâ€™s an accessible and user-friendly tool, perfect for those seeking relaxation or emotional control.
